name: Börki: Dungeon Runnner
description:
Börki: Dungeon Runnner is game where you need to find key to escape dungeon. This game can be described as run, find and escape.

===============================================================

Quick TUT

W/A/S/D - Movement

Space/Right Mouse button - dash

Your aim is to find key to get out from level you don't have time limit you  just need to survive you don't have any weapon you have only your brain and minimap you can turn it on in pause menu.

===============================================================

Upcoming in future 

-Better UI

-Settings

-Full soundtrack

-More levels

-Better  effects

-Combat system

If you want to be up to date with Börki: Dungeon Runnner follow me on:
